sub_title: Finance Analytics Manager at Kraft Heinz | Finance Transformation | Conference Speaker | AI in Finance
summary:
Finance Analytics and Automation Manager with 8+ years of experience in Financial planning and analysis (FP&A), Finance Transformation,  Management Accounting, Controllership and Supply Chain Finance within Australia, Mexico and The Netherlands.

Conference Speaker in Topics such as: Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Finance, Finance Transformation, Data Analytics in FP&A and Finance, Practical Applications of Data Science, and more!

Prior experience in Operations (Logistics & Trade), Sales with a Master's Degree in Finance and Lean Six Sigma Green Belt.

Strong background in financial modelling and data analytics using Python, Tableau, Alteryx, Power BI, SQL, Excel, Azure Machine Learning, SAP, Oracle, HFM and R.

Stakeholder focused finance business partner, who is always looking to optimize processes using data analytics and augmented intelligence.

Named 30 under 30 in the Accounting and Finance industry in Australia in 2021; Won International Rising Star in Finance 2023, Won EMEA Data Democratizer Award in 2022, Finalist in the Young Leaders in Finance Awards 2018 ; excellent communication and interpersonal skills built by studying and working in 6 countries; proficient in four languages.

A bit more about me:

✅ Launched The Financial Fox , a project to democratize machine learning and data analytics.

✅ Organized workshops and networking events for Finance Professionals in Australia and The Netherlands around data analytics, finance and machine learning.

✅ Speaker, about Finance Analytics and Career Mentor

✅ Marathon Finisher and World traveller (have been in 70+ countries and always planning next adventure!)

Skilled in management accounting, financial planning & analysis, ERP implementation, financial modeling and business analytics, business partnering, data analysis, predictive analysis, quantitative research, data visualization, communication skills, reporting, finance automation, ability to simplify complexity.

🌐 Schedule time with me for Career Mentoring or Data Analytics Coaching: https://calendly.com/christianantonio-martinez

🌐 Read my Medium Blog: https://christianmartinezfinancialfox.medium.com/

🌐 All my links: https://linktr.ee/Thefinancialfox

30 Under 30 Award in the Australian #Accounting and #Finance industry for my work at The Kraft Heinz Company and my side project The Financial Fox !

More: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/christianmartinezthefinancialfox_accounting-finance-hereatkraftheinz-activity-6873376322144628737-OZK6?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop

treasury_media.title: Finalist in the Young Leaders in Finance Awards 2018
treasury_media.description:
The awards, which are in their first year, recognised the leading professionals in finance who are under 30 years of age in Australia.

Categories include Financial Adviser of the Year, Investment Manager of the Year, Fintech Leader of the Year and I was a Finalist for Entrepreneur of the Year thanks to The Financial Fox which I started last December to help students and young professionals to get their first job in Finance!

treasury_media.title: Funds Management Process using Excel with VBA
treasury_media.description:
A hypothetical client has been bequeathed $100 million by a generous benefactor. The money has been placed into an endowment fund (HC Endowment), with the goal of being invested for ten years.

With this information of a hypothetical client, Christian Martinez and his team gained practical knowledge on the funds management process and presented a professional investment report.

treasury_media.title: Financial Analysis, Financial Modelling, Data Analysis Abilities proven via self managed Projects
treasury_media.description: Christian is constantly working on projects in areas such as econometrics, financial modelling, investment research, banking, financial infographics, Australian markets and predictive modelling.

treasury_media.title: Research on Australian Socially Responsible Equity Funds: Performance Across Market Cycles
treasury_media.description:
Research on Australian Socially Responsible Equity Funds: Performance Across Market Cycles as part of my Master of Finance at the Monash Business School

Enhanced my research skills in Finance, critical thinking, analytical skills, use of logic in preparing reports, knowledge of financial modeling, report writing skills, and fluency in English for both written and spoken communication.

treasury_media.title: Presentation of my Research on Australian Socially Responsible Equity Funds: Performance Across Market Cycles
treasury_media.description:
Presentation of my Research on Australian Socially Responsible Equity Funds: Performance Across Market Cycles. Presented to a judging panel composed by academic and Finance industry professionals in May 2018 at the end of my Postgraduate degree in Finance

There has been a significant global increase in socially responsible investing over the past decade, however debate continues about how this investment strategy affects stock market performance.

treasury_media.title: Quantify Datathon Presentation on Airbnb Geneva Data Analysis
treasury_media.description:
As part of the Quantify Datathon 2017, we have to present on our Data Analysis of Geneva's Airbnb list of properties.

It was an engaging and challenging opportunity to analyse data using Python, R, and Tableau and also communicating our findings.

profile_positions.description:
Using data analytics and automation tools to build and improve on the existing productivity-reporting infrastructure across Kraft Heinz International Zone (LATAM/EUROPE/ASIA/PACIFIC).

This role is part of the Finance team in close collaboration with business stakeholders and functions like Manufacturing, Logistics, Procurement, R&D, Quality, ORM - supporting their decision-making using analytics and data.

Responsibilities include support on reporting, annual planning activities based on specific KPIs, drive improvement projects initiatives, and ensuring the functions deliver short and long-term productivity and cost savings.

Tools used: Tableau, Alteryx, Power BI, Excel, Python
profile_positions.title: Finance Automation Manager (Finance Transformation / FP&A)

profile_positions.description:
-Provision of monthly, weekly and daily financial reports to Head Office, World Headquarters and Site Management, including detailed analysis of variances in spend to assist management in decision-making
- As an integral part of site management, assist in the development of action plans to ensure the plant controlled spend is in line with Budget/Forecast.
- Risk Management and provides management with reports to assist in decision-making
- Provide financial support for the Budget process; Cost Performance and Support
- Active involvement in project implementation and reporting, including savings validation
- SOX compliance achieved as measured by WHQ and PWC & Strategic Governance
- Cost Management

Software / Tools: Tableau, Alteryx, Excel, VBA, Power Query, Power Pivot, HFM, Oracle ERP

Scope: Site Controller at Northgate Site, Acting Site Controller at Wagga Site
profile_positions.title: Senior Finance Controller

profile_positions.description:
Acting Site Accountant for Australian Manufacturing Sites of Kraft Heinz

- Performing manufacturing analysis, variance analysis, fixed assets controls using Excel & BPCS 

- Supporting strategic planning through preparation of budgets and monthly forecasts

- Analysing and reporting on actuals against budget/forecasts

- Month end reporting and analysis

- Preparing reliable and insightful reports including monthly, ad-hoc and reporting for head office

- Providing financial information to internal stakeholders for decision making and challenging assumptions

- Assisting with internal and external audits

- Identifying and assisting with business process improvements
profile_positions.title: Management Accountant

profile_positions.description:
✔Helping Kraft Heinz to make critical business decisions based on financial data. 

✔Using financial models, Excel and BPCS ERP to support the business by examining data and providing actionable information on profitability, solvency, stability, and liquidity 

✔Operating every day with the company’s goals and current financial situation in mind and applying that focus to my work analysing budgets, income statement forecasts, and other financial data

✔Collecting and synthesizing data to build complex reports that clearly illustrate the company’s financial status and any risks that may exist.

Tourism startup that provides personalised & quick advices to travel around Australia and New Zealand via social media

financial planning

profile_positions.title: Finance Analyst | Management Accountant

profile_positions.description:
Currently completing the Wall Street Prep’s Certification in Financial & Valuation Modelling.

The program is designed to enhance the competitive profile of people pursuing careers in investment banking, private equity, equity research, business development and corporate finance

Basically I am working to develop a 3-statement model completely from scratch, inputting historical data and assumptions to project out financial statements.

I am also calculating weighted average cost of capital (WACC) in a real world company, implementing commonly used approaches to calculating terminal value, and all the nuances of DCF modelling.

Working towards representing finance issues in modeling form, such as through the Sortino Ratio or similar models and breaking down complex financial issues into simpler components to better understand how they interrelate.

Complete list of courses:
-Financial Statements
-Discounted cash flow (DCF) modelling
-Leveraged buyout (LBO) modelling
-Accretion / dilution (M&A) modelling
-Excel mechanics and functionality
-Financial modelling best practices
profile_positions.title: Financial Modeller

profile_positions.description:
This course helped gave me advanced expertise in quantitative and qualitative finance across areas such as global financial markets, financial planning, money markets and funds management.

🔹Mentor for Monash Postgraduate Association (MPA)
🔹Speaker to 150+ students on Career Advice (O'Week 2018)

🔹Individual Data Analysis Award Quantify Datathon 2017

🔹FMAA FX Trading Competition 2016, FMAA National Management Consulting Case Competition 2016, AMP University Challenge 2017
profile_positions.title: Master of Banking and Finance

profile_positions.description:
Who is Sappi? 
Sappi is a South African firm leader in producing & selling coated paper since 1936 with 13,000+ employees and offices in 50+ countries

✅Worked as an inside sales representative and logistics executive independently to tackle trade barriers and prepared proposals for clients but also in multi geographical teams to produce synergies

✅ Utilise SAP to help major accounts and ensure delivery of goods is completed in accordance with allocated timeslots and account requirements via road, rail, plane and ship

✅Developed optimization tool in Excel to determine the amount of paper needed by our customers. Lowered the time needed to help customers by 35%

✅Effectively respond to all major client customer enquiries/issues

Tasks:
-Reviewing and processing customer invoices and refunds
-Responding to enquiries from internal and external customers
-Spreadsheeting in Microsoft Excel
-Developed MS Office literacy and ERP applications
-Developed Strong Customer Service Skills
-Assisting with sales quotations
-General administration and filling duties
